appSettings.loadError: An error occurred while loading app settings.
appSettings.saveError: An error occurred while saving app settings.
appSettings.title: App Settings
appSettings.jwtRotateTokensHelp: Issue a new refresh token on each refresh and invalidate the old one. Turn off to reuse the same refresh token (disables 'JWT_RENEW_AT_SECONDS').
appSettings.jwtRenewHelp: Refresh proactively when ≤ this many seconds remain. Set 0 to disable. Keep well below access-token lifetime (e.g., 120–300s).
appSettings.idleTimeoutHelp: Max idle time (s) with no API use before the session/refresh expires; then sign in again. Typical: 900–3600.
appSettings.accessLifetimeHelp: Access token lifetime (s). After expiry, a refresh is required. Shorter = safer but more refreshes. Typical: 300–1800; keep < idle timeout.
appSettings.noteNewSessions: Saved settings will be applied on the next login.
